_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Liteloader Bedrock Dedicated Server
author: frizth_tatierra@informatics.edu.ph
description:
LiteLoaderBDS - Epoch-making & Cross-language Bedrock Dedicated Servers Plugin Loader
LiteLoaderBDS is an unofficial plugin loader that provides basic API support for Bedrock Dedicated Server, with a massive API, lots of packed utility interfaces, a rich event system and powerful basic interface support.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Liteloader First-time Install Script

rm -r /mnt/server
mkdir /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
wget https://minecraft.azureedge.net/bin-win/bedrock-server-${BDS_VERSION}.zip -O bds.zip
wget https://github.com/LiteLDev/LiteLoaderBDS/releases/download/${LL_VERSION}/LiteLoader-${LL_VERSION}.zip -O LiteLoader.zip
wget https://io.ivampiresp.com/d/Software/MCServer/BDS/LiteLoader/lae-ll-launcher
chmod +x lae-ll-launcher
unzip -o bds.zip
unzip -o LiteLoader.zip
rm LiteLoader.zip
rm bds.zip
echo "Finished Downloading Liteloader..."

variables.name: Liteloader Version
variables.description: Insert Liteloader Version from Github Releases
